explains: adj. 报警的；泄密的；搬弄是非的
n. 迹象；指示器；搬弄是非者

sentences.en: The telltale smell of cigarettes told her that he had been in the room.
sentences.cn: 那股明显的香烟味告诉她，他曾在这房间里待过。

sentences.en: Only occasionally did the telltale redness around his eyes betray the fatigue he was suffering.
sentences.cn: 只有在他眼周发红的时候才偶尔显出他有多么疲劳。

sentences.en: The handle of the telltale tea-spoon was visible under the bed-valance.
sentences.cn: 床帷下面露出了泄露秘密的茶匙柄。
